attributes.action: Install a speed camera/traffic calming measure on the Beith Road, Johnstone.
attributes.background: Vehicles are regularly driving at high speeds along the Beith Road, Johnstone where the Persimmon Homes/Dawn Homes sites are. As these houses are mostly family homes there are a lot of young children and toddlers in this area walking along the pavement on this section of the road and playing near it

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The installation of traffic calming measures for the Beith Road is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
